name: react-minimal-start
description: A template project to help you write minimal React single page apps

scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && (test -d node_modules || npm install) && mkdir -p public/build
scripts.build: env NODE_ENV=production  browserify --entry src/app.js --outfile public/build/bundle.js        --verbose --transform [ babelify ]
scripts.build:live: env NODE_ENV=development budo src/app.js:build/bundle.js --live --open --dir public -- --debug --verbose --transform [ babelify ]
